name: @contentauth/toolkit
description: WebAssembly binary and bindings for the c2pa-toolkit

scripts.dev: nodemon -x wasm-pack -e rs -w src -w ../../../c2pa-toolkit/lib -- build --dev --out-name toolkit --target web
scripts.build: rushx clean && wasm-pack --quiet build --out-name toolkit --release --target web && rimraf pkg/.gitignore pkg/package.json && rushx build:types
scripts.build:verbose: rushx clean && wasm-pack --verbose build --out-name toolkit --release --target web && rimraf pkg/.gitignore pkg/package.json && rushx build:types
